name: PetSmart
description: Chain featuring a range of pets, supplies & food (most offer grooming, boarding & other services).
address: PetSmart, 6200 McKay Ave #100, Burnaby, BC V5H 4L8

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is the best pet smart location in the lower mainland, because of the staff! They know their stuff and always have time to exchange their wisdom and information. There's a few staff there that I'm so grateful for because pet smart as a whole doesn't take super good care of their small animals , fish/reptiles, but the staff care!  Shout out to one, Sophie and Tess! Thanks for taking good care of them babies!
Edit: pic is my beardie that I didn't get from PetSmart, wouldn't recommend getting dragons from there.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Awesome pet supply store!
Got things that our pet needed and things we wanted to give it (it probably wouldn't care)

Spacious and have various choices

Their betta fish are so beautiful!
featured_reviews.review_text:

Got things that our pet needed and things we wanted to give it (it probably wouldn't care)

Spacious and have various choices

Their betta fish are so beautiful!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Great customer service, Sophie was an amazing help with advice and suggestions on what kind of a terrarium to purchase, how to decorate it and keep the eco system habitable.
Sophie was very busy running the store while short staffed although they still found the time to go through everything with me in detail and help me pick out the best items.
Whatever you are paying them, it's not enough, give them a raise.

featured_reviews.review_id: Amazing and a friendly bunch of  grooming staff. Brought in my 15 month old Samoyed for a full grooming the 1st time and he looked and smelled fabulous! I've been back a 2nd time already. Great job! Thank you
featured_reviews.review_text: Amazing and a friendly bunch of  grooming staff. Brought in my 15 month old Samoyed for a full grooming the 1st time and he looked and smelled fabulous! I've been back a 2nd time already. Great job! Thank you

featured_reviews.review_id: I can responsibly say I've had many pleasant experiences at this store but definitely not today. When I took my dog in for grooming I showed proof of vaccines as I did last time and then two of the staff actually said that my vaccine certificate was invalid. The funny thing is that with this certificate I was able to book my dog in for a training session as well as all the previous grooming services. It's hard not to suspect that they are reducing their workload in this way. The staff have always been friendly and caring perhaps this store is starting to lower their standards. Maybe they shouldn't be called petsmart but staff smart because it's obvious they are missing some smart staff.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Under normal conditions, I would not leave a review. However, the circumstances at Petsmart were so abhorrent that I feel the need to warn consumers. The treatment of the fish is very simply, inexcusable, and the standard of care fails to meet any humane criteria. In many of the tanks, particularly the smaller species such as guppies and tetras, bodies were littering the gravel floor, decorating the waters surface. They were in there for so long, a milky surface had formed on the surface, and white mold surrounded them. Some bodies simply decomposed, the skeleton visible.
In the aquatic fauna section, the leaves that remained either were yellowed and melting away. Some had tiny white dots, a possible sign of disease? There was only one row that was healthy.

I am both horrified and disappointed by Petsmart's treatment of their animals and encourage other buyers to think twice before supporting a business which does not prioritize the wellbeing of animals.

featured_reviews.review_id: Thanks Sarah! LARRY loves his new cut!
featured_reviews.review_text: Thanks Sarah! LARRY loves his new cut!

featured_reviews.review_id:
After one hour with the groomer, I received a phone call telling me that they did not have the right equipment to finish the job and did not feel comfortable going forward with my dogs haircut. I understand that he was quite matted and that it wasn't going to be an easy cut. We discussed this beforehand and I asked if he was going to be ok. The groomer checked him out and seemed confident enough. I would have preferred for her to tell me maybe look elsewhere before I handed him over. Instead I was told to book an appointment with a vet or another groomer so they could safely finish my poor boys half trimmed body. I was a little bit in shock as I carried him out to my car with big patches of hair falling off of him. There was no clean up or anything. They just stopped shaving halfway through and essentially gave up. The hard part now is finding a last minute place to take him in fix the mess I was left with.

I did enjoy coming here in the past to get my dogs nails trimmed. But after todays grooming experience, I will not be heading back.
